text.tspan: Various measures of national saving/investment (per capita, in international
The various measures of national saving and investment are ways to measure changes in total wealth. In order of increasing
comprehensiveness, these measures include: Net investment = net fixed produced capital formation and overseas investment;
Green investment = Net investment + change in natural capital; Genuine savings = Green investment + education expenditure;
GSTFP = Genuine savings + Net present value of total factor productivity (i.e. technological change).
